Text: Proposed insights and recommendations 1. Escalation handling The process after escalation seems to have long delays. We need to set a service level agreement SLA for escalation response time. 2. Resource allocation The long waits might be due to unavailability of agents. We should monitor the workload of agents and ensure that there is enough coverage especially for Level-2 agents. 3. Investigation time The long investigation times 19 hours might be due to complex issues but also might be due to inefficiencies. We should analyze what kind of issues take so long. 4.
